SELECT
busa.`user_name`, bht.`number`, bht.`contractnumber`, busa.`transaction_id`, su.`relname` userrelname, bh.`xiaoqu_name` xiaoquName, CONCAT (GROUP_CONCAT(busa.`rolenum`),",") roleName, SUM( busa.`proportion`) proportion, SUM(busa.`price`) sumprice
FROM bus_achievement busa,`bus_house_transaction` bht,`sys_user` su,`bus_house` bh WHERE 1=1
AND busa.user_name=#{userNameOne}
AND busa.examine_type=1 AND bht.`id`=busa.`transaction_id` AND su.`username`=busa.`user_name` AND bh.`id`=busa.`house_id`
AND DATE(create_time) > #{createTimeStart} AND DATE(create_time) < #{createTimeEnd}
AND su.`store_id`=(SELECT store_id FROM sys_user WHERE username=#{userName})
GROUP BY busa.transaction_id
,busa.`user_name`
ORDER BY busa.create_time DESC

SELECT ba.`id`, su.relname userrelname, SUM(price) sumprice FROM bus_achievement ba,sys_user su WHERE ba.user_name=su.username AND ba.examine_type=1
AND DATE(create_time) > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 7 DAY)) AND DATE(create_time) <= DATE(NOW())
AND DATE(create_time) > DATE(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 31 DAY)) AND DATE(create_time) <= DATE(NOW())
GROUP BY ba.user_name ORDER BY SUM(price) DESC
